page.title: 08SHOPS IN EASTFIELD
page.content: A shopping area and several mobile shops cater for the population's daily needs. The purchase of clothing, house furniture and furnishings necessitates a 5 km journey into Scarborough town centre, although mail order is a popular means of purchasing such items. There is no garage or petrol filling station so that motorists must obtain such services outside Eastfield. The main shopping centre has car parking facilities and a very modern supermarket (selling groceries, greengroceries, stationery, newspapers, wines and spirits etc.) which is well supported by nearby shops such as the post office, chemist, fish and chip shop, garden centre, two butchers, a baker's and a general store. Services available are provided by a hairdressing salon, a laundrette and a building society.
